extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains actions for executing various tools in the Java JDK.

actionInfo.name: Create JAR
actionInfo.summary: Packages an application into a JAR file.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
This action creates a JAR file.

Action Fields

Log Verbose Output

When checked, verbose output of the jar tool is saved in BuildMaster's action log.

File Name

The name of the jar file to create, relative to the target directory.

actionInfo.name: Sign JAR
actionInfo.summary: Signs a JAR file with a certificate.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
This action signs a JAR file with a certificate.

Action Fields

Keystore

The name of the keystore which contains the certificate.

Keystore Password

The password which is required to access the specified keystore.

Alias Password

The password for the key alias.

JAR File

The JAR file to sign, relative to the source directory.

Alias

The alias of the private key which is used to sign the JAR.
